title: Grayscale2
author: Grayscale2
content: If news are talking it means FTX project are very important.Kevin o leary as ambasador ...mhhh ... I don't say nothing more but If i explain how the crypto works and i make video then it will be end of the wall street and i know it's suckers game Im happy to earn so i keep quiet and will earn.I'd like to see smart people here  Im highly educated and i have no tolerance to any nonsense silly people.For me it's clear what's going on

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: FTX might be a huge threat to many, that’s why it left them with no choice but to create FUD and dump this project, now it files for bankruptcy which can give them an access to some funds that freezes by other institutions. There’s no guarantee that FTX can survive this, many investors will leave for sure and only scalpers will left hoping for a possible reversal of the trend but for me, this is already a dead end for this project, so be careful dealing with this and trade properly to avoid being liquidated.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: Grayscale2 on November 11, 2022, 04:57:28 PMFor me it's clear what's going on Then what's really going on? If you know what's going on please tell to us what exactly you have in your mind or if it's different from the news that we're seeing.I'm looking at the news but only looking directly to the Twitter accounts of the people involved like for Sam Bankman and Changpeng Zhao(CZ). They're updating their community and customers on what's really happening with this issue.

comments.author: AmoreJaz
comments.body: Quote from: blockman on November 11, 2022, 10:49:48 PMQuote from: Grayscale2 on November 11, 2022, 04:57:28 PMFor me it's clear what's going on Then what's really going on? If you know what's going on please tell to us what exactly you have in your mind or if it's different from the news that we're seeing.I'm looking at the news but only looking directly to the Twitter accounts of the people involved like for Sam Bankman and Changpeng Zhao(CZ). They're updating their community and customers on what's really happening with this issue.share his thoughts along with valid supporting details. because if it is just mere speculation, then hard to say if he is right or wrong. as we can see, FTX is indeed in big trouble right now. and maybe, they already saw this coming but maybe they were thinking that they can get away with this. sam is a known personality in crypto, so he can't just disappear or hid from this trouble. considering that binance offered and then walked away. it means, they have indeed big issues on the line.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Quote from: AmoreJaz on November 11, 2022, 11:49:10 PMQuote from: blockman on November 11, 2022, 10:49:48 PMQuote from: Grayscale2 on November 11, 2022, 04:57:28 PMFor me it's clear what's going on Then what's really going on? If you know what's going on please tell to us what exactly you have in your mind or if it's different from the news that we're seeing.I'm looking at the news but only looking directly to the Twitter accounts of the people involved like for Sam Bankman and Changpeng Zhao(CZ). They're updating their community and customers on what's really happening with this issue.share his thoughts along with valid supporting details. because if it is just mere speculation, then hard to say if he is right or wrong. as we can see, FTX is indeed in big trouble right now. and maybe, they already saw this coming but maybe they were thinking that they can get away with this. sam is a known personality in crypto, so he can't just disappear or hid from this trouble. considering that binance offered and then walked away. it means, they have indeed big issues on the line.Okay based on the recent happenings, applied for chapter 11 of bankruptcy, and then they've been hacked. So, with all of these combined circumstances, I guess that's what is clear of what's going on to them. As those things are added to each occurring, it only means that FTX is really nowhere to go and there won't be any single company that would like to help them. Oh well, at least one there's another one that I've seen wanting to help them and that's Justin Sun. I don't know if that's going to make a difference and let's see if his help will be taken or not or if it is, we shall see if it will really help them.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: goaldigger on November 11, 2022, 09:14:35 PMFTX might be a huge threat to many, that’s why it left them with no choice but to create FUD and dump this project, now it files for bankruptcy which can give them an access to some funds that freezes by other institutions. There’s no guarantee that FTX can survive this, many investors will leave for sure and only scalpers will left hoping for a possible reversal of the trend but for me, this is already a dead end for this project, so be careful dealing with this and trade properly to avoid being liquidated. For controversy they are facing on and how hard the lives of people still have balance on their exchange for sure they will curse them and tell that they will never go back if FTX will get a revive in future. Many people leaving then already because there reputation are so ruined with this incident. Also the fud spread about hacking is really bad since this will add the burden of people and thinking about negative about the whole market which can affect all investor since many think that it will dump more because of this huge issues.

comments.author: DudeAtWork420

I don't say nothing more but If i explain how the crypto works and i make video then it will be end of the wall street and i know it's suckers game Im happy to earn so i keep quiet and will earn.I'd like to see smart people here  Im highly educated and i have no tolerance to any nonsense silly people.For me it's clear what's going on FTX is important for them to give excuse and regulate crypto so that they can have much control over it. All this looks pre planned. SBF donate for Bidens election campaign, Alameda CEO's dad works in SEC so she has direct connect with them too. SBF's mother was congress campaign manager. Just link all the dot you will have the answer what just happens in here.

I don't say nothing more but If i explain how the crypto works and i make video then it will be end of the wall street and i know it's suckers game Im happy to earn so i keep quiet and will earn.I'd like to see smart people here  Im highly educated and i have no tolerance to any nonsense silly people.For me it's clear what's going on Ohh, the wolf is here.  Fud and facts are different things, now what is happening with FTX is true so its a fact that it is a sinking ship so hoping that it will stop sinking is nothing but the stupidity.Anyone with common sense will save them from the ship so it becomes a huge news and that's it.
